i18nHelper Maven Mojo
Last Published: 2012-04-11  | Version: 0.1.2-SNAPSHOT
i18nHelper Maven Mojo
Parent Project
  • i18nHelper Maven Mojo Parent
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

i18nHelper:gen

Full name:

com.summit:i18nHelper:0.1.2-SNAPSHOT:gen

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: compile.
  • Invokes the execution of the lifecycle phase process-resources prior to executing itself.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
bundleLocations FileSet[] - Places to look for bundles in the source tree, this is so we use what is explicitely written to source, instead of something external.
genInputFile File - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/i18nHelper-translated.properties.
outputDirectory File - Location of the file.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
languageCodes List - Languages codes to include in the pull, these will be added to the generated file. File output will be a java properties file

Parameter Details

bundleLocations:

Places to look for bundles in the source tree, this is so we use what is explicitely written to source, instead of something external.
  • Type: org.apache.maven.shared.model.fileset.FileSet[]
  • Required: Yes

genInputFile:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${i18n.gen.input}
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/i18nHelper-translated.properties

languageCodes:

Languages codes to include in the pull, these will be added to the generated file. File output will be a java properties file
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

outputDirectory:

Location of the file.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${project.build.directory}
